## Pages
- [Buy Credits - AI Story Garden](/credits): Purchase credits to create more magical storybooks with AI Story Garden.
- [Community Garden - AI Story Garden](/communitygarden): Explore a garden of magical stories created by our community of authors.
- [Create a New Story - AI Story Garden](/createstory): Bring your story idea to life. Describe your character, plot, and setting, and let our AI do the rest.
- [Log In - AI Story Garden](/login): Log in to your AI Story Garden account and continue creating magical children
- [My Cast - AI Story Garden](/mycast): Create and manage your personal cast of characters for your stories.
- [My Sticker Book - AI Story Garden](/stickerbook): Collect and view all your magical stickers unlocked from your stories.
- [My Stories - AI Story Garden](/dashboard): Your personal dashboard to manage and read your AI-generated storybooks.
- [Sign Up - AI Story Garden](/signup): Create your free AI Story Garden account and start making magical children
